SVGEllipseElement.summary: The SVGEllipseElement interface provides access to the properties of ellipse elements.

SVGEllipseElementRx.summary: The rx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis radius of the ellipse as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("rx")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("ellipse")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the radius of the ellipse along the x-axis in the user coordinate system.

SVGEllipseElementRy.summary: The ry read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis radius of the ellipse as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("ry")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("ellipse")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the radius of the ellipse along the y-axis in the user coordinate system.

SVGEllipseElementCx.summary: The cx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the center of the ellipse as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("cx")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("ellipse")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the x-coordinate of the ellipse's center in the user coordinate system.

SVGEllipseElementCy.summary: The cy read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis coordinate of the center of the ellipse as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("cy")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("ellipse")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the y-coordinate of the ellipse's center in the user coordinate system.
